About

I am currently a fourth year Ph.D. student in the Department of Statistics and Operations Research at University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, under the supervision of Professor Yufeng Liu. I received a B.S. in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics From Fudan University, China in 2015.

I am interested in developing and analyzing new statistical machine learning methodologies with application brain image data. I am currently a research assistant supported by Professor Dinggang Shen in the IDEA Group at UNC School of Medicine.

In my spare time, I enjoy swimming and cooking. I also have a passion on playing the ukuleles.
